content: lsbcreates com gammy shawl gammy shawl by lisa borum for personal use only copyright @lsbcreates 2023 page 1 of 2 lsbcreates com gammy shawl size instructions one size dimensions length 65 /162 cm center set up row 1 rs make a magic_ring depth 32 /81 cm chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in the magic circle yarn row 2 ws chain 2 3 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 1 worsted weight cascade yarns 220 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 1 3 superwash aran wave 100% double_crochet in last double_crochet superwash wool 110g 3 5 oz / 150 yds 137 5 m color solar 108 6 hanks row 3 rs chain 2 3 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 1 approximately 800yds 732m 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space crochet hook chain 1 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet us i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook or size row 4 ws chain 2 3 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 1 needed to obtain gauge * 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 repeat from * to chain-2 space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain-2 space notions * chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space repeat from * to the scissors last double_crochet 3 double_crochet in the last double_crochet tapestry needle repeat row 4 until you have 39 row 6 cardboard for cutting tassel strips shell border gauge over 4 = 16 double_crochet and 5 25 row 40 chain 2 3 double_crochet in first double_crochet slip_stitch in row unblocked chain-1 space 5 double_crochet in second double_crochet repeat to chain-2 space slip_stitch in chain-2 space 5 double_crochet in second abbreviations double_crochet slip_stitch in chain-1 space repeat to last double_crochet 4 chain - chain double_crochet in the last double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet cut yarn with about 5 /13 cm tail pull rs - right side through the last st weave in all loose sl - slip ends space - space or st - stitch tassel border ws - wrong side using cardboard wrap yarn around it - repeat multiple times cut yarn to make 12 - stitch in chain space strips using 3 strips at a time and your crochet hook pull the strips from the notes skills used in this pattern are middle through every other double_crochet and chain stitches and double crochets chain 2 create a knot to secure the strips to the at the beginning of each row does not shawl count as a double_crochet block soak your finished shawl in cool magic_ring tutorial *lsb creates is water for approximately 20 minutes not affiliated with this youtube tutorial squeeze excess water from shawl and https //youtu be/ex02jpoxf_k lay flat to dry completely si=4dexdwtw5bzicsjp for personal use only copyright @lsbcreates 2023 page 2 of 2
